en.bdb: O Nanak, are obtained by chanting the Name of the Lord, Har, Har with one's tongue; all sins are washed away. ||1||
en.ms: and who utters the God's Name with his tongue; all his sins are washed off, O Nanak.

es.sn: Millones de caridades y baños no te purifican como lo hace el Nombre de Dios. (1)

en.ms: Similarly, it the True Spouse abides in the mind, all the sins are washed off, O Nanak.
